entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_38_lejo_daramus.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_43: Oh, yes. Hello. I was wondering if you could help me? I need a place to do my research, but I'm a bit short of funding. Then I found this place, only it's overrun with all these creatures. Can you rid the bunker of some of them for me?
entries.s_45: No, I don't think so. They were here first.
entries.s_47: Oh, yes. Quite. I suppose that's one way of looking at it.
entries.s_48: Thank you. That should help. Now, I just need to start setting up my equipment before any more vermin show up.
entries.s_49: Please rid the bunker of some of its vermin.
